QuestData.Title: Plague is Thicker Than Water
QuestData.Description:
Come closer, my apprentice... I have a mission of dire import!
A necromancer came to our house recently, sent by the lich Margrave Sin'dane! He seemed so polite, always eager to lend a hand in my lady's most volatile creations.
But I grew wise, my apprentice. The way he skulked around, prodding for our most sensitive experiments...
He was trying to steal our slimes! I know it!
You should admonish him quite harshly. Show that no harm will come to our friends!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A guest of the House of Plagues; a victim of the unfortunate accident.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Find Marileth in the House of Plagues.
QuestData.RewardText: Our slimes will be safe, my dear apprentice!
